choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Dear [Boss's Name], 

It is with a heavy heart that I write this letter to inform you of my decision to leave the company. After careful consideration, I have decided it is time for me to move on and pursue new opportunities. 

I am grateful for the experiences and lessons I have learned during my time here at [Company Name]. It has been a pleasure working with all of you, and I will always cherish the memories we shared together. 

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to ensure a smooth transition. I am happy to help in any way possible. 

Thank you for your understanding and support during my time here at [Company Name]. I wish you all the best of luck in the future. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
